00039 JournalTab::JournalTab(QWidget *parent, const char *name)
00040     : QWidget(parent,name)
00041 {
00042     journalData = JournalData::instance();
00043 
00044     printed = false;
00045     
00046     main.vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this, 0, -1, "journalTab::main.vBoxLayout");
00047     main.vBoxLayout->setMargin(5);
00048     
00049     main.labelLayout = new QBoxLayout(main.vBoxLayout, QBoxLayout::LeftToRight);
00050     
00051     main.topLabel = new GlobalGoBackLabel(this, "journalTab::main.topLabel");
00052     connect(main.topLabel, SIGNAL(goBack()), this, SIGNAL(switchToHome()));
00053     
00054     main.saveAndClear = new QPushButton(
00055             QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/saveAndClear.png") ),
00056             "Save and Clear (F8)", this, "journalTab::main.saveAndClear");
00057     main.saveAndClear->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00058     connect(main.saveAndClear, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(saveAndClear()));
00059     
00060     main.print = new QPushButton(
00061             QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/print.png") ),
00062             "Print Journal Entries (F9)", this, "journalTab::main.print");
00063     main.print->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00064     connect(main.print, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(printJournal()));
00065     
00066     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.topLabel, 0, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00067     main.labelLayout->addStretch();
00068     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.saveAndClear);
00069     main.labelLayout->addSpacing(5);
00070     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.print);
00071     
00072     main.dataTable = new JournalTable(this, "journalTab::main.dataTable");
00073     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(switchToHome()), this, SIGNAL(switchToHome()));
00074     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(switchToAccounts()), this, SIGNAL(switchToAccounts()));
00075     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(switchToReports()), this, SIGNAL(switchToReports()));
00076     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(switchToHelp()), this, SIGNAL(switchToHelp()));
00077     main.dataTable->installEventFilter(this);
00078     
00079     main.vBoxLayout->addSpacing(5);
00080     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.dataTable);
00081     
00082     main.summary = new JournalSummary(this, "journalTab::main.summary", main.dataTable);
00083     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.summary);
00084     
00085     main.hr = new QLabel("<hr>", this, "journalTab::main.hr");
00086     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.hr);
00087     
00088     
00089     main.bottomWidget = new QWidget(this, "journalTab::main.bottomWidget");
00090     main.bottomHBoxLayout = new QHBoxLayout(main.bottomWidget, 0, -1, "journalTab::main.bottomHBoxLayout");
00091     
00092     main.bottomLabel = new QLabel(
00093             "<nobr><b>Keyboard Control:</b></nobr><br>"
00094             "<nobr> &nbsp; &nbsp; <b>Enter</b>: Edit current field, move to next field</nobr><br>"
00095             "<nobr> &nbsp; &nbsp; <b>Insert</b> / <b>Delete</b>: Create new entry / Delete selected entry</nobr>",
00096     main.bottomWidget, "journalTab::main.bottomLabel");
00097     
00098     main.bottomRightFrame = new QFrame(main.bottomWidget, "journalTab::main.bottomRightFrame");
00099     main.bottomRightBoxLayout = new QBoxLayout(main.bottomRightFrame, QBoxLayout::LeftToRight, 0, -1,
00100                                                "journalTab::main.bottomRightBoxLayout");
00101     main.bottomRightBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00102     
00103     main.importButton = new QPushButton(
00104             QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/import.png") ),
00105             "Import from CSV (F11)", main.bottomRightFrame, "journalTab::main.importButton");
00106     main.importButton->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00107     connect(main.importButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(importCSV()));
00108     
00109     main.exportButton = new QPushButton(
00110             QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/export.png") ),
00111             "Export to CSV (F12)", main.bottomRightFrame, "journalTab::main.exportButton");
00112     main.exportButton->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00113     connect(main.exportButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(exportCSV()));
00114     
00115     main.bottomRightBoxLayout->addWidget(main.importButton, 0, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00116     main.bottomRightBoxLayout->addWidget(main.exportButton, 0, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00117     
00118     main.bottomHBoxLayout->addWidget(main.bottomLabel);
00119     main.bottomHBoxLayout->addStretch();
00120     main.bottomHBoxLayout->addWidget(main.bottomRightFrame);
00121     
00122     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.bottomWidget);
00123 }
00124 
00125 void JournalTab::importCSV()
00126 {
00127     if(ImportExport::importCSV(ImportExport::JournalTmp))
00128         main.dataTable->populate();
00129 }
00130 
00131 void JournalTab::exportCSV()
00132 {
00133     if(journalData->journalTmpEmpty())
00134         return;
00135 
00136     ImportExport::exportCSV(ImportExport::JournalTmp);
00137 }
00138 
00139 bool JournalTab::eventFilter(QObject *target, QEvent *event)
00140 {
00141     if(event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress)
00142     {
00143         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = (QKeyEvent*)event;
00144         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F8)
00145         {
00146             saveAndClear();
00147             return true;
00148         }
00149         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F9)
00150         {
00151             printJournal();
00152             return true;
00153         }
00154         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F11)
00155         {
00156             importCSV();
00157             return true;
00158         }
00159         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F12)
00160         {
00161             exportCSV();
00162             return true;
00163         }
00164     }
00165     
00166     return QWidget::eventFilter(target,event);
00167 }
00168 
00169 void JournalTab::saveAndClear()
00170 {
00171     if(journalData->journalTmpEmpty())
00172         return;
00173 
00174     if(!printed)
00175     {
00176     SaveAndClearDialog dialog(this, "journalTab::saveAndClear()::dialog");
00177     dialog.exec();
00178 
00179     switch(dialog.result())
00180     {
00181         case 0:
00182         journalData->saveAndClear();
00183         main.dataTable->unpopulate();
00184         break;
00185         case 1:
00186         printJournal();
00187         journalData->saveAndClear();
00188         main.dataTable->unpopulate();
00189         break;
00190         default:
00191         break;
00192     }
00193     }
00194     else
00195     {
00196     journalData->saveAndClear();
00197     main.dataTable->unpopulate();
00198     }
00199 }
00200 
00201 void JournalTab::printJournal()
00202 {
00203     if(journalData->journalTmpEmpty())
00204         return;
00205 
00206     ReportsGenerator *reportsGenerator = ReportsGenerator::instance();
00207     if(reportsGenerator->printJournalEntryReport())
00208     printed = true;
00209 }
00210 
00211 void JournalTab::showEvent(QShowEvent*)
00212 {
00213     main.dataTable->setFocus();
00214 }
